amendment.description: Amendment allows the Bureau of Land Management to reissue grazing permits during fiscal year 2001 if they are unable to process all expiring permits because of a lack of available resources.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to allow the Bureau of Land Management to reissue grazing permits during fiscal year 2001 if they are unable to process all expiring permits because of a lack of available resources.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Regula amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
